data.eml:eml: The congrid eel genus Ariosoma in Taiwan (Anguilliformes: Congridae), with description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Smith, David G., Ho, Hsuan-Ching, Huang, Jian-Fu, Chang, Yong-Hsu (2018): The congrid eel genus Ariosoma in Taiwan (Anguilliformes: Congridae), with description of a new species. Zootaxa 4454 (1): 84-106, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4454.1.10
